scripts.build:cli:full: npm run build:backend && npm run build:contracts && npm run build:sdk && npm run build:cli
scripts.clean: npm run clean:all:build && npm run clean:workspace:modules && npm run clean:root:modules
scripts.clean:all:build: concurrently "npm run clean --workspace=sdk" "npm run clean --workspace=backend" "npm run clean --workspace=cli" "npm run clean --workspace=web" "npm run clean --workspace=contracts"
scripts.clean:workspace:modules: concurrently "npm run clean:modules --workspace=sdk" "npm run clean:modules --workspace=backend" "npm run clean:modules --workspace=cli" "npm run clean:modules --workspace=web" "npm run clean:modules --workspace=contracts"
scripts.prettier: concurrently "npm run prettier:sdk" "npm run prettier:backend" "npm run prettier:web" "npm run prettier:cli" "npm run prettier:contracts"
scripts.prettier:check: concurrently "npm run prettier:sdk:check" "npm run prettier:backend:check" "npm run prettier:web:check" "npm run prettier:cli:check" "npm run prettier:contracts:check"
